summary: [Spoilers] Possibly the best GOT OST ever made, Change my mind!
title: [Spoilers] Possibly the best GOT OST ever made, Change my mind!
body:
Light of the seven

Will never forget the first time watching this with the Fiancée and the whole build up through the episode left us speechless and the explosion while Cersei sips her wine with that devious smirk was just outstanding, I love this series and I love Cersei! I seem to be the only one out of my friends cirlce that admire Cersei but she is just absolutely ruthless and now with nothing to loose she is even more of a threat IMO, You don’t fk with someone with nothing to loose.. Lena Headey is just amazing.

Anyway very much looking to Season 8! Cant wait.



Source: https://ift.tt/2KVAwmT

summary: "Game Of Thrones" Just Finished Filming For The Last Time Ever
title: "Game Of Thrones" Just Finished Filming For The Last Time Ever
body:
“Game Of Thrones” Just Finished Filming For The Last Time Ever

Obviously, we’ll get to see the last six episodes at some point next year, but they’ve finished filming and the cast have all now scattered off in their own separate directions.

The wrap party was a few weeks ago, and many of them went to Kit Harington and Rose Leslie’s wedding – which must have been like a second wrap party – but a lot of people stayed on in Northern Ireland as there was still…

View On WordPress

Daenerys Targaryen

Givenchy

summary: [SPOILERS] what I think the Nights King’s motivation’s should be
title: [SPOILERS] what I think the Nights King’s motivation’s should be
body:
We see in the show (se6 ep5)(riph) that the children of the forest created the white walkers to combat the first men. And we assume that that’s what happened. White walkers are robots designed to attack humans….But what if that’s not what happened. What if the first walker was in fact a Stark and what if the “spell”, or what have you, that the children gave him wasn’t enough. What if the first walker, a Stark, refused to just be a puppet that attacked his own people. That the children were not all that powerful since they were defeated eventually. And what if he wasn’t this all powerful being we see in the night king. He’s stronger, sure. But can be killed by any weapon. He’s a stronger human that looks like a walker, basically. He resists the children and decides to live in isolation rather than attack his own people. He is a Stark and they love their honor don’t they?. But eventually the children try their ritual on others. Some do what the first did. Refuse. So the children go after… less than the noble, and these people, born from tragedy and seek revenge LOVE their new strength, and that’s when they start attacking humanity, and eventually their makers. Through the new walkers they have conjured their, and the first men’s, own doom. BUT the very first walker fights these new walkers back. He doesn’t fight them to end them, but to help them. Helps them to understand that they are puppets to the children. That they are better than being strings to the others. Some walkers he must kill. Some believe what he is saying and join his side…. But some.. They follow as well, but with motivations to eventually go back and kill every person they can.. The first walker, now the leader of a tribe of walkers has a child. The first pure white walker. His father and mother preach, while their circumstances are terrible, not all of humanity is bad. That it only takes a small group to create the perspective that a race is rotten and evil. That the first men, and children will hold what the walkers are by using what a fraction of them did. Not what the whole of them are. That the first men will not approve of their existence. They warn their son not to use his new found power for harm. For that will prove their point. For they bring the winter. Through this pure born’s childhood he discovers how strong his powers can actually be… He’s stronger than the rest. He can’t be hurt with simple weapons. He can bring a cold that others can’t imagine. This gives those that have wanted to hurt the children and humanity time to flood his mind with hate, anger, and revenge. They encourage his anger and aggression. Telling him that he and his people do not deserve to live in isolation the way his father wants. He grows to believe this. The first pure is now a teen. Growing his own thoughts and ideas. Although others have tried to corrupt his mind with hate and revenge, he genuinely tries to continue and follow his parents wisdom.

He’s lived with small attacks against his people from the first men before. Fought back, himself. It was not new to him. But one day. It was not just the small group of rebels that they were used to. This was an army. The greatest army created. Meant for one specific reason- to wipe the walkers out. The teen fought back, but there were too many. He watched the ones he loved be slaughtered. The people he loved and cared for killed for no reason. His people that sought isolation for peace were not even given that. They were hunted. He held his bleeding mother in his arms, still a child, he started to cry. His fathers dead body next to hers. His mother couldn’t get a last word out. She looked into his eyes and was gone. He remembered the warnings that others gave him about the first men. The pure born stood by his parents bodies. The remaining forces gather around ready to kill. The pure born kneels, defeated. Ready for death. The first men leader expresses condolences. “I’m sorry little one”. As the first men’s leader contemplates his decision, one of his men starts to undress the pure ones mother’s body for jewelry…. Others take apart his fathers physical body for evidence. Before the leader can strike…. the wind howls and grows COLD. A cold no one has felt. The pure born stands with his fists clenched. The man that searched his mother goes for the stab, his blade shatters. The Night King picks him up by his throat and snaps it. The Night King manages to kill most. Some run.

Through hundred and thousands of years he trains to resurrect his people. When he does, they are not the ones he remembers. Just bones and dust. His loved ones are gone forever. But some remain… ready for his command.



Source: https://ift.tt/2NDokFW
